title: The Mill on the Floss - narrator is concerned with

content.prompt: In the passage, the narrator is most concerned with

choices.label: describing the values held by the Dodsons
lamenting the decline of religious values in the lives of people like the Dodsons

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Identify and describe details, diction, or syntax in a text that reveal a narrator's or speaker's perspective.
